title: Himi 154
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e kakai angavaivai
‘Oku monū’ia
Ko e pule ‘o e langi
‘Oku ‘onautolu.
2.
Pea ‘oku monū’ia
‘A e kakai tangi
‘I he’enau angahala,
Ki he ‘Eiki lelei.
3.
He te nau fiemālie
‘I he’enau ma’u
‘A e fakamolemole
‘I honau ‘Otua.
4.
Pea ‘oku monū’ia
‘A e anagamalū
Te nau ma’u ‘a e fonua,
‘O honau ‘Otua.
5.
Mo e kau fiekaia,
Ki he angatonu
Pea mo e fieinu
Te nau monū’ia.
6.
He ko e mā’oni’oni
‘A ia, ‘oku nau
Feinga ke nau lava’i,
Te nau fonu ‘i ai. *
